Instruction: In a bowl, mix diced strawberries with balsamic vinegar, chopped basil leaves, salt, and black pepper.
Brush baguette slices with olive oil and arrange them on a baking sheet.
Bake the baguette slices in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until lightly toasted.
Top each toasted baguette slice with a spoonful of the strawberry mixture.
Sprinkle crumbled goat cheese over the strawberry mixture on each slice.
Serve the strawberry balsamic bruschetta immediately as a flavorful side dish or appetizer.
